root.name: HK-Means
root.description: This segmentation method performs a N-class thresholding based on a K-Means classification of the image histogram, then extracts objects in a bottom-up manner using user-defined minimum and maximum object sizes. Very useful to detect clustered objects in fluorescence microscopy.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.6.0.0 Date 2013-10-30 18:24:23
Updated to Icy 1.4.0.0 (new support for 3D ROI)
- Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2013-10-30 15:47:18
Added final threshold parameter in block version
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2013-06-12 16:52:22
3D ROI export
- Version 2.3.1.0 Date 2012-11-16 16:53:52
Display a message dialog indicating that ROIs cannot be exported in 3D
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2012-10-31 17:28:21
New: output the extracted objects as a list of ROI in block mode
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2012-09-11 09:42:24
HK-Means is channel aware
- Version 2.1.2.0 Date 2012-08-03 10:42:00
Fixed the output file name generation
- Version 2.1.1.0 Date 2012-08-02 17:02:14
* Show appropriate error when given an incorrect class number * Adjust the output file name to the input name + a suffix (and a incremental number if used via EzPlug)
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2012-06-28 17:57:52
* fix: throw handled exception if input is null (obviouslyâ€¦) * blocks: updated output to use VarGenericArray
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 13:35:29
Support for Blocks programming.
- Version 1.4.2.0 Date 2012-05-31 16:30:48
fixed: trying to access an EzGUI when running within Blocks
- Version 1.4.1.0 Date 2012-05-31 15:18:02
adjusted classpath and field visibility
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2012-05-11 18:58:29
new: changed internal structures and output to use integers instead of shorts new: updated to ConnectedComponents v.3.2.0.0 (components sorting)
- Version 1.3.3.0 Date 2012-04-12 13:56:01
Updated to Filter toolbox 2.1.0.0
- Version 1.3.2.0 Date 2012-04-06 18:50:43
Results names are incremental for easier differentiation.
- Version 1.3.1.1 Date 2012-02-20 11:54:00
Updated to EzPlug 1.6.4.1 (no logic change)
- Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2011-11-29 17:15:16
* added label on the interface displaying the total number of detected objects
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2011-11-19 16:52:45
* new: export detections to the swimming pool for tracking purposes * new: export detections as ROIs on the input sequence
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2011-11-09 13:27:26
updated to icy.type.DataType
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2011-09-09 19:12:39
New: added optional parameter to discard objects below a certain intensity threshold within the extraction process
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2011-05-27 15:57:33
- New: added a method to output the connected components found in the sequence - New: the total number and ID of the components are displayed in the console and the output sequence.
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-05-19 17:33:49
- switched to non-beta state - adjusted default parameters
- Version 1.0.0.0b Date 2011-05-19 17:23:54
initial submission
